price: 27. (Entonces Salomón) dijo: «Veremos si has dicho la verdad o eres de los mentirosos.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
